definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: breathe, blow (NH [[פּוּחַ]] blow out; Ar. (rwx), fa0xa = Heb., so Aram. [[פּוּחַ]], pah.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇפוּחַ הַיּוֹם]] Ct So 2:17, So 4:6 until the day breathes, i.e. grows cool.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇפִיחַ]] Ps 10:5 +; [[יׇפִחַ]] Pr 14:25; [[וְיׇפֵחַ]] Hb Hab 2:3, etc.; Imv. fs. [[הָפִיחִי]] Ct So 4:16; —
cause garden (acc.) to exhale (sc. odours) Ct So 4:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[עַל]] pers., Ez Eze 21:31 with the fire of my wrath will I blow against thee.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: c. [[לוֹ]] Ps 12:6 puff, = pant for it (so most; Thes Hi al. against whom men puff; Bae [[אׂפִּיעַ]] [[לוֹ]] I will shine forth to him); [[לַקֵּן]] Hb Hab 2:3 the vision panteth (hasteth) towards the end (so most).
breathe out, utter, [[כְּזׇבִים]] Pr 6:19, Pr 14:5, Pr 14:25, Pr 19:5, Pr 19:9, [[אֱמוּנׇה]] Pr 12:17.
